head_commit.message:
VPN-4795: Tighter exclusion routing (#7377)

* Cleanup: Merge HopConnection and InterfaceConfig
* Cleanup: Merge WgQuickProcess into InterfaceConfig
* Move server address exclusion down into the daemon
* Move server exclusion routing down into WireguardUtils
* Convert hopindex to hopType and fix windows daemon
* Make Q_ENUM logging consistent (missing space after log)
